text: 1:5 2 Samuel 7:14; 1 Eghaghaniba 17:13; Onger Akaba 2:7; 89:26-27; Aposel 13:33; Hibru 5:5Egha God dughiatam uan enselɨn tam kamaghɨn a mɨkemezir puvatɨ, “Nɨ nan Otarim, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn kɨ nɨn Afeziamɨn oto.” O a kamaghɨn enselɨn tam mɨkemezir puvatɨ, “Kɨ uabɨ ia inigh, egh ian Afeziamɨn mɨn ikɨtɨ, ia nan Otarimɨn mɨn ikiam.” Bar puvatɨ.
